p: On January 28, 2020, the WHO issued a paper summarizing guidelines from the WHO and clinical evidence collected from the treatment of previous HCoV epidemics. This study addresses measures to classify and sort patients with extreme acute respiratory disease, methods to avoid and contain infections, early intervention and monitoring therapy, guidelines for laboratory diagnosis, management of respiratory failure and ARDS, management of septic shock, prevention of complications, treatments, and consequences for pregnant patients (Cascella et al. 2020).
